content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello, Mr. Abbasi. I am not obligated to discuss the rental price until we are in the apartment. Let's focus on the apartment itself. It's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's close to all important facilities like supermarkets and public transportation. Now, let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds nice. I would like to rent the apartment for 400 euros.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I can do better than that. 500 euros would be more in line with the market value of this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but considering the current market situation, I believe 425 euros would be a fair price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm afraid that's too low. The apartment is in the city center and has all the amenities. I can meet you halfway. How about 475 euros?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds more reasonable. I accept your offer of 475 euros.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [475] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Abbasi. I am glad we could come to an agreement. The apartment will be available from the 1st of next month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you, Mr. Abbasi. I look forward to our professional relationship. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
